org.magelan.core
Interface RotatableEntity

All Superinterfaces:
DrawingElement, Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
InsertEntity, LabelEntity, TextEntity
public interface RotatableEntity
extends Entity

Defines a rotatable entity. Most entities will not need to implement this interface since they can be rotated by simply changing their modifiers but some (text entities, blocks etc.) defining only an insertion point will need a rotation angle to be specified.

Version:
1.2, 05/2004
Author:
Assen Antov
